description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Alone or with friends, you must face the end of the world. Each day the game gets more difficult and you will need to plan your playtime carefully or risk losing your entire group. How many days will you survive?
description.short: Alone or with friends, you must face the end of the world. Each day the game gets more difficult and you will need to plan your playtime carefully or risk losing your entire group. How many days will you survive?
